creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Robe of lavendar satin brocaded in gold with large, beribboned happiness characters, plum blossoms, and bamboo.  No border.  Wide sleeves with narrow band of blue satin brocaded with floral sprays in gold.  Edging of black satin. Collar band extending all the way down front and around bottom of the dame.  Lining of thin blue silk.  A woman's robe.
title: Woman's Robe
